actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT NEG
FROM listanegozi
WHERE Coordinatore = '{{SelectCoordinatore.selectedOptionValue}}'
AND NEG NOT IN ('SEDE', 'SMART WORKING')
UNION
SELECT NEG
FROM listanegozi
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM listanegozi 
    WHERE Coordinatore = '{{SelectCoordinatore.selectedOptionValue}}'
)
AND NEG NOT IN ('SEDE', 'SMART WORKING')
ORDER BY NEG;
